item.title: Theatre Network
item.description: Interactive visualization for theatre network Blue nodes represent 210 focal theatres, and orange nodes represent 630 non-focal theatres. The size of ndoes is based on its degree. Highlighting: Double-click on a node to fade out all but its immediate neighbours. Double-click to bring them back again. Tooltip: When we hover over the node or link, this will display the node’s or link’s measures. Table of Contents Network Measures Global Centrality degree centrality Clossness centrality Betweenness centrality Eigenvector centrality Other Network Measures Clustering Effective size K nearest neighbors (KNN) Core number Theatre attributes Network Measures Global Centrality degree centrality nx.
